General.Name: Amorepacific Corp Pref
General.Description: Amorepacific Corporation manufactures and sells beauty, household, and healthcare products worldwide. The company offers skincare products, cleansers, toners and fluids, moisturizers, eye care products, serums, masks, and special care and travel products. It provides anti-ageing, dryness, tone and texture, sun protection, and makeup products. The company was founded in 1945 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

1.Name: Mr. Sangbae  Shim
1.Title: Chief Exec. Officer, Pres, Chief Production Officer and Exec. Director

2.Name: Mr. Hak-Hee  Kang
2.Title: Chief Technology Officer and Exec. Officer of R&D Unit
